H0.text: In 2001: A Space Odyssey, what was the name of the computer that took control of the spaceship Discovery. OMNI

H1.text: In 2001: A Space Odyssey, what was the name of the computer that took control of the spaceship Discovery. SPECTRA

H2.text: In 2001: A Space Odyssey, what was the name of the computer that took control of the spaceship Discovery. CYGNUS

H3.text: In 2001: A Space Odyssey, what was the name of the computer that took control of the spaceship Discovery. HAL9000

A4.text: HAL 9000 is a sentient artificial general intelligence computer that controls the systems of the Discovery One spacecraft.
